hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t.COLUMN_NAME,t.DATA_TYPE,nvl(c.COMMENTS,t.COLUMN_NAME) as COMMENTS from user_tab_columns t left join user_col_comments c on c.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME and c.COLUMN_NAME= t.COLUMN_NAME where t.TABLE_NAME = :tableName
select t.TABLE_NAME,t.COMMENTS from user_tab_comments t where t.TABLE_NAME in :tableName
select table_name from user_tab_comments where table_name like :tableName
select 1 from user_tab_columns where TABLE_NAME = :tableName AND COLUMN_NAME = :columnName
